mapper.sql: logid, field_code, main_type, table_name, field_name, field_desc, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM as_notice_field WHERE 1=1 AND main_type = #{main_type} ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO as_notice_field( logid, field_code, main_type, table_name, field_name, field_desc, create_time ) VALUES( #{logid}, #{field_code}, #{main_type}, #{table_name}, #{field_name}, #{field_desc}, #{create_time} )
mapper.update: UPDATE as_notice_field SET logid = #{logid}, field_code = #{field_code}, main_type = #{main_type}, table_name = #{table_name}, field_name = #{field_name}, field_desc = #{field_desc}, create_time = #{create_time} WHERE logid = #{logid}
